title: Questlove Win, Anthony Anderson, Come On Will!, The Final Four and more.
itunes:title: Questlove Win, Anthony Anderson, Come On Will!, The Final Four and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Junior hits Big Dog with the question.  The CLO's plate has a lot of triangulation and slickness today.  Questlove won big at the Oscars and paid tribute to his mother.  Tommy has a "Come On Dog" just for Will.  This Will Smith situation is making people hella cautious at comedy clubs.  The Final Four is right around the corner and Steve is happy with the powerhouses.  Studies have proven that profanity is side-effect free.  Anthony Anderson and his wife of 22 years are divorcing.  This round of Would You Rather involved apparitions.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve says it, "Get your focus where your focus belong!" 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
